name: Neha Verma
subject: Computer Science
bio: Neha Verma ensures students learn programming, web development, and digital literacy with practical exposure to real-world tech.

name: Manoj Singh
subject: Hindi
bio: Manoj Singh brings rich cultural context to Hindi literature, grammar, and writing, making language classes engaging and rooted.

name: Pooja Sharma
subject: Art & Craft
bio: Pooja inspires creativity in children by teaching painting, origami, and craftwork. Her students often participate in art competitions.

name: Deepak Mehta
subject: Physical Education
bio: Deepak is a certified fitness coach who leads physical training and sports activities, promoting health and discipline among students.

name: Anjali Srivastava
subject: Music
bio: Anjali trains students in classical and contemporary music, managing school choir and annual cultural performances.

name: Karan Joshi
subject: Environmental Studies
bio: Karan blends theory with practice to teach eco-awareness and leads student-driven green initiatives and plantation drives.

name: Shalini Pathak
subject: General Knowledge
bio: Shalini encourages curiosity and awareness by conducting weekly quizzes, debates, and knowledge-based competitions.

name: Vikas Anand
subject: Moral Science
bio: Vikas guides students in ethics, behavior, and empathy through interactive storytelling and real-life examples.
